word: Strife Among Brethren Delays Second Advent.--For forty years did unbelief, murmuring, and rebellion shut out ancient Israel from the land of Canaan. . . . It is the unbelief, the worldliness, unconsecration, and strife among the Lord's professed people that have kept us in this world of sin and sorrow so many years.--MS 4, 1883. (Ev 696.)
